import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-control', templateUrl: './control.component.html', styleUrls: ['./control.component.css'], }) export class ControlComponent { switchOn = false; toggleSwitch() { this.switchOn = !this.switchOn; } }
